description: Monitors the bot replication status through the UI console.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The request for the unique bot ID of the replicated bot being monitored.

parameters.name: replicaRegion
parameters.description: The request for the region of the replicated bot being monitored.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The unique bot ID of the replicated bot being monitored.

nested_items.name: replicaRegion
nested_items.description: The region of the replicated bot being monitored.

nested_items.name: sourceRegion
nested_items.description: The source region of the replicated bot being monitored.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The creation date and time of the replicated bot being monitored.

nested_items.name: botReplicaStatus
nested_items.description: The operational status of the replicated bot being monitored.

nested_items.name: failureReasons
nested_items.description: The failure reasons the bot being monitored failed to replicate.
